release.change: Added support for PADherder's custom authentication to support non-ASCII characters in username or password (issue #29)
Added a settings to automatically shut down the Listener when the capture is done (issue #35)
Added the ability to capture data from multiple hostnames (US, JP, Amazon, custom)
Added the former Listener modes back
Improved logs when the listener start/stop fails
Removed the deprecated Listener modes (Manual and AutoWifi proxy)
Added a new Listener mode (Auto Iptables)
Fixed rare occurring bugs (on Switch Listener and Main screens)
Fixed the Wifi not restart in Auto Proxy mode. Some devices might work without restart, some won't ...
Added the ability to start the listener on non local IP to allow capturing data from another device on the network (ex : from iOS)
Added the ability to share the capture.json
